title: Perform Clinical Trial Close-Out
description: A clinical operations lead is managing the close-out phase of a completed study.

tasks.description: Ensure all clinical sites have had a final close-out visit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies in the CTMS that all close-out visits are marked as complete.

tasks.description: Perform a final reconciliation of the Trial Master File (TMF) to ensure all required documents are present and filed correctly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a TMF completeness report and finds it is 100% complete.

tasks.description: Ensure all outstanding payments to vendors and sites have been made.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms with the finance department that all study-related invoices are paid.

tasks.description: Formally archive the study records and update the study status to 'Completed' in the CTMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent archives the TMF and updates the system status.
